name: BeyondCraft
tagline: Crafting a better world, one block at a time
body:
### Welcome to BeyondCraft
Blah blah

If you're using the GitHub for Mac, simply sync your repository and you'll see the new branch.

### How to be a good BeyondCraft citizen

Rules:

1. Never grief ANYTHING. Griefing means destroying anything that you did not build and who's owner did not give you permission. This includes all liquids. The mods will give you 1 warning if you're online. *Permanent Ban* if you grief twice or at mod's discretion.
1. NEVER curse. There are children playing in this server.
The mods will give you 1 warning if you're online. *Permanent Ban* if you curse twice or at mod's discretion.
1. Never steal. The mods will give you 2 warning if you're online. *Permanent Ban* if you steal three times or at mod's discretion.
1. Be polite. I know this sounds silly, but sometimes you might need to say please. Even if you don't curse, that doesn't mean you can't be rude. Temporary Ban if you're rude.
1. No pretending to be a mod. The admin knows all the mods personally, so they will know if you do. *Permanent Ban*
1. NO derogatory terms. No saying things like "Girls are stupid." Or "Gay people suck." You will be banned. We are accepting of all here. That doesn't mean you can't have personal opinions, but please keep them to yourself.
1. No advocating products. This server's only purpose is to provide enjoyment. NOT to tell people about your server.

### Want to chat? Join our hangout!
We chat on the BeyondCraft hangout. To join, go to 

Instructions and link here for those who aren't familiar w hangouts.

### Request access to BeyondCraft
BeyondCraft is invitation only. You have to be on our whitelist to get in to the server. Let us know you want to join by filling out this form.

Form goes here.

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with Pages? Check out the documentation at http://help.github.com/pages or contact support@github.com and weâ€™ll help you sort it out.
